entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023
